title: Wolf Tooth pops out premium Alloy Bar End Plugs to match other WTC parts
content:
Bar end plugs serve a few purposes. They protect the end of your bar. They can prevent taking a core sample of your mid-section if you get a bar to the stomach during a crash. They can also anchor your bar tape (if you prefer to wrap it that way). They also offer an opportunity [â€¦]

The post Wolf Tooth pops out premium Alloy Bar End Plugs to match other WTC parts appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
